other_title: Bishōjo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S (Japanese)
Sailor Moon e il mistero dei sogni (Italian)
美少女戦士セーラームーンSuperS (Japanese)
plot: The senshi fight against the Dead Moon Circus (Zirconia, Nehelenia, the Amazon Trio, the Amazoness Quartet), who wants to ultimately take over the world. This season is heavily centered around Chibi-usa and her relationship with Helios (Pegasus).
opening_theme: "Moonlight Densetsu" (ムーンライト伝説) by Moon Lips
ending_theme: "Watashi-tachi ni Naritakute" (私たちになりたくて) by Miwako Fujitani (eps 1-13)
"'Rashiku' Ikimasho" (“らしく”いきましょ) by Meu (eps 14-39)
